entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Blazor input display language problem #9928
  • Centered StackLayout within StackLayout does not center #9927
  • CollectionView: add events ItemClicked and ItemDoubleClicked #9921
  • CollectionView: ScrollTo does not work [Windows11, Android11/12, iOS not tested] dotnet --version: 6.0.400 #9920
  • [Enhancement] Add different input types for prompt #9913
    Backlog
  • When ListView is the only element in a ContentPage in a shell tabview, listview last items don't render on screen (iOS) #9911

Closed

  • Cant add a variable to Grid rows more than once. #9493
  • Fails build on Microsoft-openjdk@17 #9912
  • MAUI App bundle size is too large on release mode #9453
    Backlog
  • RefreshView containing SwipeView causes AccessViolationException on Windows #9894
  • Pair to Mac failed with error "Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten' version '6.0.4' is lower..." #9800
  • Directory.GetFiles/CreateDirectory/Exists..etc throw System.UnauthorizedAccessException when only a folder is specified #9898
  • Auto [Routing] add #9885

PullRequests

Created

  • First load absolute image paths before trying drawables #9926
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • Merge compiler warning fix from main/net7.0 #9925
  • [Windows] Fixes DatePicker format #9924
    community ✨
  • Correctly layout the WebView #9923
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22452.2 #9922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix focused events in SearchBar #9918
    t/bug, area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Core] Fix ImageButton IsLoading property #9917
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [Android] Fix rendering using WebView without Source #9916
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Shorten the msi filenames #9915
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove pipelines check #9914
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix TypeConverts API Docs #9780
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Try fix API docs #9757
    area/docs 📓
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.6.1.7 to 1.7.0 #9845
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Simplify ShellItem Parenting #9221
    area/shell 🐢, 7.0-rc2
